body:
#### PR description:

As per https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49693#issuecomment-3710786027

- adhere to non member variable naming conventions
- avoid adding useless variables

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.

title: Miscellaneous fixes to SiStripApproximateCluster_v1
